channel.title: How i Change The attack speed of a Player
channel.description:
Hello,
I need help with my server. The source is Testscape and when i attack my character attack very fast... how do i change this.
I hope someone can help :D Tnx

item.title: How i Change The attack speed of a Player
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

[quote=“Chuck_norris, post:13, topic:243032”]try going into client.java and search delay
perhaps you find someting usefull[/quote] ^^^^^^ that was the most usefull thing on this thread… keep to the topic please

Read full topic

item.source: How i Change The attack speed of a Player

item.title: How i Change The attack speed of a Player
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

Eddie12390:

Just set a delay on your attacks. Make it so that the player can’t attack until they wait a certain amount of time. You may want to set it different for every item though.

umm listen to this good man VVVVVVVVVVV

si force:

Don’t use TestScape, Its just plain bad.

[quote=“Eddie12390, post:5, topic:243032”]Im an idiot? You don’t even know how to change your JDK version. It is possible to change your attack speed by clicking faster because almost each time you click it attacks. No, it doesn’t permanently change it, but you can attack faster that way.[/quote][quote=“Eddie12390, post:7, topic:243032”]In a previous topic you said because it didn’t find someone’s JDK they needed a new source.

And I know a way to not lag, its called my server is hosted on a dedi[/quote]

show me this topic plz so i can show you wrong

and what about your server is dedi? i think that is no useful info

Read full topic
item.source: How i Change The attack speed of a Player

item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

Just set a delay on your attacks. Make it so that the player can’t attack until they wait a certain amount of time. You may want to set it different for every item though.

item.title: How i Change The attack speed of a Player
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

Im an idiot? You don’t even know how to change your JDK version. It is possible to change your attack speed by clicking faster because almost each time you click it attacks. No, it doesn’t permanently change it, but you can attack faster that way.

Read full topic
